description: (Winter 2014) Explorations of nested sampling with Prof. Baines.
README.md: The STA 299 git repository! Relevant papers: + Skilling, J. (2006) Nested Sampling for General Bayesian Computation. Bayesian Analysis, 1-4, pp.833--860. + Feroz, F., Hobson, M.P. and Bridges, M. (2009) Multinest: an efficient and robust Bayesian inference tool for cosmology and particle physics. MNRAS, 398-4, pp. 1601--1614. + Brewer, B.J., Partay, L.B. and Csanyi, G. (2010) Diffusive Nested Sampling. Arxiv: 0912.2380 + Chopin, N. and Robert, C.P. (2010) Properties of Nested Sampling. Biometrika, 97-3, pp. 741--755 + Newton, Raftery ... + Radford Neal blog post + Christian Robert blog post + Weinberg paper
